Michigan Initial Health & Safety Training Module B
Section 1: Child Development

Video: Five Steps For Brain Building: Serve & Return

This video from the Early Learning & knowledge Center explains how your interaction with a child can have a huge impact on their early brain development. It provides good examples of the ‘serve & return’ practice.

Disclaimer - Please note this video shows a crib in the background that is unsafe for infant sleep. This background image shows unsafe sleeping practices, such as toys, blankets, and a pillow in the crib, along with a highly raised mattress. We do not support these unsafe sleep practices. Infants are to be placed on their backs, on a firm mattress with a fitted sheet, in a crib that is free from soft materials such as toys, pillows, bumper pads and blankets.
